name: Dotcraft.
description:
Dotcraft. is a minimal color-based combination puzzle game. To solve the puzzles, move the dots by sliding your finger in different directions to line up with the matching slots. Create hand-crafted shapes in each level. Those who can't find the right path to match the dots with the correct slots, please enjoy the Swap Option! You can easily change the place of two dots.

There are 2 different boards to play:

Linear: Move the dots by sliding horizontally or vertically to line up with the matching holes.

Diagonal: Place the dots by sliding along vertically or diagonally to line up with the same color-coded slots.

Features:
Free to Play!
No ads option
Mind-bending difficulty and colorful design
2 Different fun and challenging boards - Linear & Diagonal
Play through 600 beautifully designed brain-twisting levels
Peaceful and relaxing music and sound fx

One Touch Gameplay
Touch and slide your finger along the given directions.

Visual Developments
If you want to see your Dotcraft. different than others check our themes page, there are 7 unique and stylized themes.

Playmodes
Play on Soft Mode to create shapes without having to worry about time or move limits-No Stress..

If you want to test your brain, try Challenge Mode to see your time and move counts by creating shapes and improve your strategy!

You can also connect via Facebook or Google+ to see your and your friend's score on leaderboard in every level!
